subject: Motocross
X Games
Accidents and Safety
lead_paragraph: After the death of Jeremy Lusk, a top freestyle rider, a group of riders and action sports industry figures is trying to mitigate some of the risks of Motocross.
snippet: After the death of Jeremy Lusk, a top freestyle rider, a group of riders and action sports industry figures is trying to mitigate some of the risks of Motocross.
